name: AutolevelEnemies
_source: level_var;AvgPlayerLvl;{e:math.floor(sum([u.get_internal_level() for u in game.units if not u.dead and u.team == "player" and not u.get_field("IgnoreLvl")])/max(1, len([u for u in game.units if not u.dead and u.team == "player" and not u.get_field("IgnoreLvl")])))}
for;enemy_unit;[u.nid for u in game.units if u.team.startswith('enemy')];no_warn
